doc.title: Easy Money
doc.plot: A BBC documentary crew spend a few weeks with British porn actress Violet Storm and her partner and manager Jim. Jim also shoots other girls in his series "The F**k Truck" even though Violet doesn't like to watch the tapes afterwards. The film examines their strained relationship as Jim says he loves her but also sees her as an investment and wants her to do more movies to get her out there as a brand.
